title: Really long wait between victory/defeat screen and stat screen on new client
body: anyone else have an extremely long time staring at the "L" with the circle going around it before end game stat screen? since installing the new client? it takes from 1-4 minutes sometimes a lot of times everyone in the game has finished Flaming to each other and left the screen already. Just me? any fixes?

replies.body: I've Got the same problem on alpha now, but on legacy its not longer than 5 sec to load, so conection is not problem, any help?

When the match ends, your network is transitioning from the game server back to pvp.net.  Something with your connection might be causing a block or delay from allowing that transition to occur.  My suggestion would be to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help smooth your network out.  I hope that helps!
